mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum rn, hw.* FROM (SELECT * FROM homework ORDER BY h_regi_date desc ) hw ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO homework USING DUAL ON (h_num = #{h_num}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET h_title = #{h_title}, h_content = #{h_content}, h_level = #{h_level}, h_deadline = #{h_deadline}, h_modi_date = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(h_num, m_num, h_title, h_content, h_level, h_deadline, h_regi_date) VALUES(homework_seq.nextval, #{m_num}, #{h_title}, #{h_content}, #{h_level}, #{h_deadline}, sysdate)
